This is a great little gem hidden in the tiny tiny streets of El Gotico  thanks Jamie for bringing us here  and I must say that I'm not sure I'll be able to find it again. :-) The place is small  20 people top  and run by a quite old woman from Sahara, if I remember correctly, and my understanding was that everything you eat here is homemade by her. I don't remember what I had but I remember distinctly that was awesome. Just try something out by yourself or ask, they'll explain to you (not sure they speak English though). It's no fast food here, you have to seat down, take your time, enjoy the atmosphere and the delicious food.
